system.availability: Allows a human body to be broken down into a variety of useful substances such as Tallow Fat, Oils, Bonemeal, Marrowjuice, and so on. One Corpse can be rendered into materials that grant +20 to Focus Power Tests requiring Sacrifices or Profane Symbols. Best Craftsmanship versions are lighter and about the size of a small footlocker.
system.cost: Not innately heretical but often used by heretics
